item.description: Michael Garifullin - Technical Lead PHP Developer Living in Dublin, Ireland, Work Permit in Ireland: Stamp 4 (no work permit required), Citizenship: Russia +353 85 2209967, garifullin@gmail.com SKILLS I’m fluent with PHP including the modern changes. SQL databases optimisation is a very usual thing for me. I have no friction to participate in improvements related to the frontend parts of project written in javascript. I’m familiar with Vue.js and React. I used MongoDB and Laravel for my pet projects but MySQL and Symfony is still my main tools for achieving goals.

Do you remember how much times during you developer career you forgot to add some IDE files to .gitignore? There is a feature that could help you to get rid of creating .gitignore with common excludes for every new project. And this feature is called global .gitignore file.
